name: Nido (John Wanamaker)
description:
Use your mouse to setup a cozy little campsite for you and your lover.

Controls:

Mouse to Move

Left Button to Grab Things

Left Button + Right Button to Grab Other Things

Devlog:

This game is a bit janky but it has heart. I was at a loss for the initial design of the game and ended up going with a collision based interaction framework. I quickly learned that Unity collisions are terrible, do not trust them. If I had more time I would make my own physics system or copy someone else's on Stack Overflow. Last night before the deadline I realized that the line widths for my hand drawn assets were all messed up. But the vibe and the theme for the game is something I am proud of. For my next game I am focusing on a no collision based interaction, wish me luck and see you in three weeks.
